title: Spring Data with Mark Paluch | DataStax
description: Cedrick Lunven talks with Mark Paluch, Spring Data Lead at Vmware, about the origins of the Spring Framework, how he got involved with Spring Data, and the 3.0 release of the Spring Data Cassandra module, which is based on the DataStax Java Driver 4.x series.
